summary: A utility that parses Python and Cython source files via the abstract syntax tree to locate dataclass definitions—including those used in decorators—move them to the module’s top level, and perform name substitutions, enabling automated generation of tests for dataclasses and Cython cdef classes.
business_intent: Automate the preparation and transformation of source code so that dataclass and Cython class definitions are standardized and easily testable, reducing manual effort in creating unit tests for data‑centric structures.
